Detailed Description

C++ manager for creating the velocity model database.

void openDB ( const char *  filename,
const int  cacheSize,
const char *  description 
)

Open a new database.

Description of database is included in database metadata along with the hostname where database was created and the time the database was created.

Parameters:
filenameName of file
cacheSizeSize of cache in MB
descriptionDescription of database

void quiet ( const bool  flag)

Set flag indicating creation should be quiet (no progress reports).

Default behavior is for to give progress reports.

Parameters:
flagTrue for quiet operation, false to give progress reports
